author: Dashveenjit Kaur
description:
The Trump AI chip policy reversal announced this week signals a shift in how advanced computing technologies will flow in global markets, as the administration prepares to dismantle Biden’s complex three-tier regulatory framework. Set to take effect on May 15, 2025, the Biden administration’s Framework for Artificial Intelligence Diffusion would have created a stratified global […]

The post Trump AI chip policy to scrap Biden’s export controls appeared first on AI News.
title: Trump AI chip policy to scrap Biden’s export controls

author: Muhammad Zulhusni
description:
Apple continues its focus on hardware produced in-house, and is currently working on a new generation of chips for future hardware, according to Bloomberg. The processors are thought to be destined for use in smart glasses, AI-capable servers, and the next generations of Macs. One project involves a custom chip designed for smart glasses, which […]

The post Apple developing custom chips for smart glasses and more appeared first on AI News.
title: Apple developing custom chips for smart glasses and more
